mapper.sql: VolunteerKey, ExaminationNumber, VolunteerNumber, SchoolKey, MajorKey, DeclareTime, AdmissionStatue, AdmissionTime
mapper.insert: insert into EXAMINEEVOLUNTEERINFORMATION() values (#{volunteerkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examinationnumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteernumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declaretime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{admissionstatue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admissiontime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into EXAMINEEVOLUNTEERINFORMATION
volunteerkey, examinationnumber, volunteernumber, schoolkey, majorkey, declaretime, admissionstatue, admissiontime,
#{volunteerkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examinationnumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteernumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declaretime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{admissionstatue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admissiontime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: update EXAMINEEVOLUNTEERINFORMATION set examinationnumber = #{examinationnumber}, volunteernumber = #{volunteernumber}, schoolkey = #{schoolkey}, majorkey = #{majorkey}, declaretime = #{declaretime}, admissionstatue = #{admissionstatue}, admissiontime = #{admissiontime} where volunteerkey = #{volunteerkey}

update EXAMINEEVOLUNTEERINFORMATION
examinationnumber = #{examinationnumber},
volunteernumber = #{volunteernumber},
schoolkey = #{schoolkey},
majorkey = #{majorkey},
declaretime = #{declaretime},
admissionstatue = #{admissionstatue},
admissiontime = #{admissiontime},
where volunteerkey = #{volunteerkey}
mapper.sql: VolunteerKey, ExaminationNumber, VolunteerNumber, SchoolKey, MajorKey, DeclareTime, AdmissionStatue, AdmissionTime ,SchoolName,briefIntroduction,Phone,Address
mapper.select: SELECT s."SchoolName",e."AdmissionTime",m."MajorName",s."BriefIntroduction",s."Phone",s."Address" from EXAMINEEVOLUNTEERINFORMATION e,SCHOOLINFORMATION s,MAJORINFORMATION m WHERE e."ExaminationNumber"=#{ExaminationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e."MajorKey"=m."MajorKey" and e."SchoolKey"=s."SchoolKey" ORDER BY e."AdmissionTime" DESC
